original_title: むしろピンクが素晴らしい
overview: Two 23-year-olds.Shota is a jobless person living in Shibuya.Takumi lives in Sasebo and is about to submit his resignation to his workplace.Two people who don't even know each other live in a city far away from each other.Photos taken with an instant camera taken 24 years ago shows the world one year before they were born!What did they find, guided by that photo?
title: Rather it looks pink
